meaning list.sentence translation: ទីបំផុត ជណ្តើរយន្តដំណើរការហើយ។

meaning list.meaning: ថប់បារម្ភ, បារម្ភ (គុណនាម)
meaning list.sentence: She was worried about her son’s health.
meaning list.sentence translation: គាត់​ព្រួយ​បារម្ភ​ពី​សុខភាព​កូន​ប្រុស​គាត់។

meaning list.meaning: បារម្ភ, បារម្ភ (កិរិយាសព្ទ)
meaning list.sentence: Don’t worry; everything will be fine.
meaning list.sentence translation: កុំបារម្ភ; អ្វីគ្រប់យ៉ាងនឹងល្អ។

meaning list.meaning: អាក្រក់ (គុណនាម)
meaning list.sentence: The situation is getting worse day by day.
meaning list.sentence translation: ស្ថានភាពកាន់តែអាក្រក់ទៅៗពីមួយថ្ងៃទៅមួយថ្ងៃ។

meaning list.meaning: អាក្រក់បំផុត (គុណនាម)
meaning list.sentence: That was the worst experience of my life.
meaning list.sentence translation: នេះជាបទពិសោធន៍ដ៏អាក្រក់បំផុតក្នុងជីវិតរបស់ខ្ញុំ។

meaning list.meaning: អីយ៉ា! (ឧទាន)
meaning list.sentence: Wow, that’s an incredible painting!
meaning list.sentence translation: អីយ៉ា នេះជាគំនូរមិនគួរឱ្យជឿ!

meaning list.meaning: នៅឡើយ (គុណកិរិយា)
meaning list.sentence: The package hasn’t arrived yet.
meaning list.sentence translation: កញ្ចប់មិនទាន់មកដល់ទេ។

meaning list.meaning: ទោះយ៉ាងណាក៏ដោយនៅតែ (គុណកិរិយា)
meaning list.sentence: The weather is cold, yet he went swimming.
meaning list.sentence translation: វាត្រជាក់ ប៉ុន្តែគាត់បានទៅហែលទឹក។

meaning list.meaning: របស់អ្នក, របស់អ្នក (សព្វនាម)
meaning list.sentence: This book is yours, not mine.
meaning list.sentence translation: សៀវភៅនេះជារបស់អ្នក មិនមែនជារបស់ខ្ញុំទេ។

meaning list.meaning: សូន្យ (លេខ)
meaning list.sentence: The temperature dropped to zero last night.
meaning list.sentence translation: កាលពីយប់មិញ សីតុណ្ហភាពធ្លាក់ចុះដល់សូន្យ។
